TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击控件中的 "插入" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "插入" 的按钮）时， 控件将引发 事件，但在 控件插入记录后。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 这使您可以提供一个事件处理程序，以便在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如检查插入操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，该处理程序允许您确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受插入操作影响的记录数，请使用 属性。To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用 属性来确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置 属性，指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果需要访问插入记录的值，请使用 属性。If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 默认情况下， 控件返回到插入操作后 属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an insert operation. 若要将 控件保持在插入模式下，请将 属性设置为 "`true`"。To keep the control in insert mode, set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用传递到 事件的事件处理程序的 对象来确定是否在插入操作过程中发生了异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化 类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||`e` 参数中包含的 对象。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为 `false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为 `false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定受插入操作影响的行数。Use the property to determine the number of rows affected by the insert operation. 此值通常用于验证是否插入了适当数量的行。This value is commonly used to verify that the appropriate number of rows was inserted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定受插入操作影响的行数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of rows affected by the insert operation. summary.span: 获取插入操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示插入操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定在插入操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且您决定在事件处理程序中处理异常，请确保将 属性设置为 `true`;否则，异常将传递到调用堆栈上的下一方法以进行处理。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定插入操作期间是否引发了异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception was raised during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在插入操作过程中引发异常时，请使用 属性指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 如果将此属性设置为 "`true`"，则会将该异常视为已处理的异常，并且不会在调用堆栈中向上传递。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not passed further up the call stack. 如果将此属性设置为 `false`，则异常将传递到调用堆栈上的下一方法以进行处理。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. 若要确定引发的异常，请使用 属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作完成后 控件是否仍保持插入模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation.

value.span: 如果在插入操作完成后仍保持插入模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to remain in insert mode after an insert operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件返回到 属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property. 使用 属性指定在插入操作后 控件是否仍保持在插入模式下。Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation. 若要将 控件保持在插入模式下，请将此属性设置为 `true`。To keep the control in insert mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 如果希望只偶尔重写默认模式，则应使用此属性。This property should be used when you want to want to override the default mode only occasionally. 如果默认情况下 控件需要保持在插入模式下，请改为设置 属性。If the control needs to remain in insert mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在插入操作后将 控件保持在插入模式下。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to keep the control in insert mode after an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含已插入记录所对应的字段名/值对的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

value.span: ，包含已插入记录的键字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性访问插入记录的字段值。Use the property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record. 例如，您可以使用这些值来保存插入记录的日志。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records. 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示插入记录的字段 对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the inserted record. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用 对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问插入记录的字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the fields of the inserted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]
